channel.title: Error:Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.outofmemoryError: Java heap space
channel.description:
Help after a few people logging into my server i get the error
[b]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.outofmemoryError: Java heap space[/b]
After that noone else can login at all, can someone tell me how to solve this?

umm, what does your run.bat file look like, i think i might be able to fix it.
